step_feedback.feedback: Good job tightening your fists and muscles as you brought your arms in. Keep that inhale going!
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally while relaxing and exhaling. Great form!
Well done on repeating the movement. Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you exhale.
Good work on the repetition. Focus on a smooth exhale as you extend your arms and relax.
Great job completing the repetitions! Ensure your fingers are fully open and relaxed at the end of each outward movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles as you bring your arms in, then exhale and relax as you extend them outwards. Keep up the good work!
